subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Turner Sports and the N.C.A.A. announced a 14-year deal that includes management of NCAA.com, the primary Web site for all 88 N.C.A.A. tournaments and other services.
snippet: Turner Sports and the N.C.A.A. announced a 14-year deal that includes management of NCAA.com, the primary Web site for all 88 N.C.A.A. tournaments and other services.
